sentences.sContent: News of 160 lay-offs had sent tremors through the community.
sentences.sCn: 裁员160人的消息在社区中引起了波动。

remMethod.val: trem(抖动)+or → 颤动； 颤抖

words.tran: 发抖地；震颤地；歪斜地；过分敏感地
震颤的东西；发抖的人；摇尾鸟

trans.tranCn: 颤动； 颤抖， 战栗
trans.tranOther: a slight shaking movement in your body that you cannot control, especially because you are ill, weak, or upset
